message.body: Hey did you pick show days yet?
No, what day did you choose?
Sounds good, I'll do the same.
The later date
Are you around campus?
Aw ok do you still wanna check out the mfa tomorrow?
No, in Somerville
I sang Karaoke last night, I never sing, I just watch... What has Somerville done to me!!
I do want to. My class will end around 1, and I will have a few small errands to do around campus b4 I'll be totally free.
I also have reading to do. Want to be my study buddy?
Oh my god how much fun?
I love karaoke
But I need to Loaded!!!
Yeah, I was way less loaded then expected... I met some people around here the other nigh and hung out with them again last night... I sang, or screamed rather, the pixies...
I would love a study buddy, sitting in a coffee shop right. Is to do some reading... Alone
I'm too far away to do I right now, but I'm down for the future!
Yes!! Study buddy!!!
Let's go to the library together maybe?
Oh I mean tomorrow?!! Ha not today.
Oh, yeah!! Awesome! We can Also walk trough the MFA and read in there!
We have access to so much right now, we should definitely take advantage!
Oh Whoa
Haha
I like that idea
Ok so what time do you want to meet
Hmm, how about 1:30?
Awesome
Ok great
Meeting my sister to say hi. I'm at Longwood n Binney. Call me when you finish your errands and we can study/play

Sounds good, I think I need another hour. I just got oh of figuring out his to use a camera, I still need to file some paperwork. I'll let you know how my status is going. Sorry, the day is takin way longer then I thought.
It's ok
Do you want to just meet for dinner?
Yeah, that might be better... I think my next few hours might get eaten by paperwork...
Ok well I'm in the library if you want to join and do paperwork here
Just finally getting a chance to eat something now, be over there in 15
Phew girl! You busy!
Just a little, craziness!!
Cait my little sister is going to come join me so I might have to run out in like fifteen twenty minutes
Oh so we are going to read in the library for an hour after want to get a drink?
Yeah, would love to!
You run into anyone?
Plus feel free to join us. Nobody not one soul!
Yeah bummer let's get a grad happy hour started here
Haha, everyone else is on weekend mode already, I guess.
What a good idea, so we all have a group to chill with when we want to.
Yeah friday nights!
We will help all the grad students get laid including me
Hahahahah, oh fantastic!!!
And me!!
Yes! Of course
Soooo fantastic hanging out last night! My head felt it this morning!
Omg amazing
Do you remember a Winston we were talking to? Apparently I gave my number out to him at about 12:30 last night... I'm pretending to remember, but I don't know of I do.
Oh man. You are crazy lady. I don't remember!!! Sorry!! How are you?
Hahah, I don't either, apparently I approached him... I don't really understand why I didn't keep hanging out with him if I liked him... Drunk Cait never makes much sense though.
I'm doing ok, lying on the couch BC I think I'm getting a UTI... Week, but I'll be better by later. How are you doing.
Just woke up from a nap...
Hey, just missed your call, sorry. Making so food, ill call you back after!
You doing anything tonight btw?
No plans was thinking about reading or watching a movie.. You?
Im just cleaning now
I'm so lazy
Me2. But that was awesome. !!!!
Yeah same, I don't think I feel like going out after so much fun last night.
I know!! I love dancing and am thrilled you do too!!
I love dancing
Except I don't like it when boys try to grind on me!
Only if i really like the boy
Remember old man grossly who smelled like marlboros
Hahahha I know right... It's like ahhh how old are we!!
Ahhh im such a dork im watching the final episodes of oz and I'm so psyched for it to over
Remember him
Marlboro mouth
Nd then younger guys trying to dance on us and being so awkward
Oh man men have no game
Eeeeeeew I totally forgot about gross old man!!!
Hahahha!!
It's a turn off I just want them to talk to me and ask me about my day and get me a drink and not stand too close
Dude you were hanging out with someone tall and preppy When I was making out with ginger lawyer

Yes!!!! It was hilarious!! That is why I am wondering about this guy I gave my number to right b4 I left..... There is no way it was a guy who was dancing.... But I'm trying to figure out if he is the slightest bit cool, or a total dork!
HahahahahhahHhhha yes, exactly!!! Hi, can I get you a drink while you're dancing...
Haha, hehehe!! You were making out with ginger!?!?!?
Yeah... I actually went home with the preppy one, he lives in LA and was here visiting his friends.
When I peaced out on this other guy that I gave my number to is when I left with preppy.
Hahaha you mean you brought him home? He looked cute
Nice pick
Yeah that's who I was thinking of
Yeah I did, he was cute, but lives in LA, so never again... Now to get down to the bottom of this other dude... Haha
Well, do you have ginger's number???
Well kind of
He gave me his card but I'm not going to call him
If he's interested he should get my number from Nadine
I really want the guy to ask me out.. I don't want to pursue. It sounds old fashion
But it's honest. I'm lazy he can plan a date...
Until I meet someone I'm super super super into ( like u crushing on that 2nd year)
Yo do you want to come over and walk around Coolidge corner
It's pretty
If not I totally understand
Yeah, I hear you... I agree, he should ask for you number... But tell Nadine that, let it get back to him so he DOES call you.
It could be fun if he plans a date
I have to pee like every 30 minutes, somehow last weeks hookup is catching up to me now.
I'm exhausted and could easily go back to sleep
Or get some work done
I am in hang over purgatory
Yeah
Haha
I'm sorry, would love to chill with you, but even with medicine I'm in a little pain.... I know, no I s funny!!!!
I mean not funny
That sucks ...
Oh
Cranberry juice
They have good stuff over at trade joes
It's kind of a reminder to myself of why I DON'T always enjoy hooking up. Oh I know, trader joes is the shit!!
I took cranberry pills also, they help too
Trader Joe's is one of the only places that sells natural cranberry juice at an affordable price.
Love it there might go tonight actually
Just got back from trader joes, Nadine wanted cran juice for her uti...￼

Hehe, that's funny!! I'll blame it on our yummy drinks last night, it definetly isn't sex causing this... Tell Nadine it was a pleasure meeting her last night, and that I look forward to us all partying again together soon.
